typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sk_customer as integer,
		customer_id as string,
		customer_unique_id as string,
		customer_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		customer_city as string,
		customer_state as string,
		birth_date as string,
		birth_year as integer,
		birth_month as integer,
		generation as string,
		age as integer,
		age_category as string,
		gender as string,
		name as string,
		marital_status as string,
		income as string,
		social_state as string,
		employement_status as string,
		job_role as string,
		phone_operator as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		order_id as string,
		order_item_id as string,
		product_id as string,
		seller_id as string,
		shipping_limit_date as date,
		price as double,
		freight_value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orderItemsDL
source(output(
		order_id as string,
		payment_sequential as integer,
		payment_type as string,
		payment_installments as double,
		payment_value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orderpaymentsDL
source(output(
		order_id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		order_status as string,
		order_purchase_timestamp as date,
		order_approved_at as date,
		order_delivered_carrier_date as date,
		order_delivered_customer_date as date,
		order_estimated_delivery_date as date,
		delivery_service_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ordersDL
source(output(
		sk_delivery_service as integer,
		delivery_service_id as string,
		delivery_service_name as string,
		delivery_service_city as string,
		delivery_service_state as string,
		delivery_service_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		delivery_service_reg_date as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDeliveryService
source(output(
		product_id as string,
		product_category_name as string,
		product_name_lenght as string,
		product_description_lenght as string,
		product_photos_qty as string,
		product_weight_g as string,
		product_length_cm as string,
		product_height_cm as string,
		product_width_cm as string,
		product_description as string,
		unit_price as integer,
		product_quantity_on_hand as integer,
		product_discount as double,
		product_brand as string,
		supplier_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> productDL
source(output(
		supplier_id as string,
		supplier_comapny as string,
		supplier_city as string,
		supplier_state as string,
		supplier_zip_code_prefix as string,
		supplied_quantity_for_month as integer,
		supplier_reg_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> supplierDL
source(output(
		delivery_service_id as string,
		delivery_service_name as string,
		delivery_service_city as string,
		delivery_service_state as string,
		delivery_service_zip_code_prefix as string,
		delivery_service_reg_date as string,
		delivery_service_duration as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deliveryServiceDL
source(output(
		sk_product as integer,
		product_id as string,
		product_brand as string,
		product_category_name as string,
		product_weight_g as double,
		product_length_cm as double,
		product_height_cm as double,
		product_width_cm as double,
		product_volume as double,
		package_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string,
		product_photos_quantity as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
source(output(
		sk_supplier as integer,
		supplier_id as string,
		supplier_comapny as string,
		supplier_city as string,
		supplier_state as string,
		supplier_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		supplier_reg_date as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSupplier
source(output(
		sk_order_details as integer,
		order_id as string,
		payment_type as string,
		order_status as string,
		is_delivery_delayed as string,
		has_discount as string,
		is_returned as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimOrderDetails
source(output(
		sk_review as integer,
		review_id as string,
		order_id as string,
		review_score as integer,
		review_comment_title as string,
		review_comment_message as string,
		review_creation_date as timestamp,
		review_sentiment as string,
		review_answer_timestamp as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimReview
source(output(
		sk_seller as integer,
		seller_id as string,
		seller_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		seller_city as string,
		seller_state as string,
		no_of_products_sold as integer,
		product_categories_sold as string,
		seller_size as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSeller
orderItemsDL derive(scd_is_current = "YES") ~> AddTempSCD
orderpaymentsDL select(mapColumn(
		payments_order_id = order_id,
		payment_sequential,
		payment_installments,
		payment_value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPaymentFactColumns
JoinOrders, SelectPaymentFactColumns join(order_id == payments_order_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrderPayments
ordersDL select(mapColumn(
		orders_order_id = order_id,
		customer_id,
		order_purchase_timestamp,
		order_approved_at,
		order_delivered_carrier_date,
		order_delivered_customer_date,
		order_estimated_delivery_date,
		delivery_service_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrderFactColumns
AddTempSCD, SelectOrderFactColumns join(order_id == orders_order_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrders
DimCustomer select(mapColumn(
		sk_customer,
		dim_customer_id = customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustomerFACTColumns
JoinDimOrderReviews, DimCustomerFACTColumns join(customer_id == dim_customer_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimCustomer
JoinSeller select(mapColumn(
		order_id,
		order_item_id,
		shipping_limit_date,
		price,
		freight_value,
		order_purchase_timestamp,
		order_approved_at,
		order_delivered_carrier_date,
		order_delivered_customer_date,
		order_estimated_delivery_date,
		payment_sequential,
		payment_installments,
		payment_value,
		product_unit_price,
		product_quantity_on_hand,
		product_discount,
		supplied_quantity_for_month,
		delivery_service_duration,
		sk_order_details,
		sk_review,
		sk_customer,
		sk_delivery_service,
		sk_product,
		sk_supplier,
		sk_seller
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFinalFACTColumns
DimDeliveryService select(mapColumn(
		sk_delivery_service,
		dim_delivery_service_id = delivery_service_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimDeliveryServiceFACTColumns
JoinDimCustomer, DimDeliveryServiceFACTColumns join(delivery_service_id == dim_delivery_service_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimDeliveryService
productDL select(mapColumn(
		dim_product_id = product_id,
		product_unit_price = unit_price,
		product_quantity_on_hand,
		product_discount,
		supplier_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductsFACTColumns
JoinOrderPayments, SelectProductsFACTColumns join(product_id == dim_product_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
supplierDL select(mapColumn(
		stage_supplier_id = supplier_id,
		supplied_quantity_for_month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSupplierFACTColumns
JoinProducts, SelectSupplierFACTColumns join(supplier_id == stage_supplier_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSupplier
deliveryServiceDL select(mapColumn(
		stage_delivery_service_id = delivery_service_id,
		delivery_service_duration
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDeliveryserviceFACTColumns
JoinSupplier, SelectDeliveryserviceFACTColumns join(delivery_service_id == stage_delivery_service_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDeliveryService
DimProduct select(mapColumn(
		sk_product,
		dim_product_id = product_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProductFACTColumns
JoinDimDeliveryService, DimProductFACTColumns join(product_id == DimProductFACTColumns@dim_product_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimProduct
DimSupplier select(mapColumn(
		sk_supplier,
		dim_supplier_id = supplier_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSupplierFACTColumns
JoinDimProduct, DimSupplierFACTColumns join(supplier_id == dim_supplier_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimSupplier
DimOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		sk_order_details,
		dim_details_order_id = order_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimOrderDetailsFACTColumns
JoinDeliveryService, DimOrderDetailsFACTColumns join(order_id == dim_details_order_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimOrderDetails
DimReview select(mapColumn(
		sk_review,
		dim_reviews_order_id = order_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimOrderReviewFACTColumns
JoinDimOrderDetails, AggByOrderId join(order_id == dim_reviews_order_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimOrderReviews
DimOrderReviewFACTColumns aggregate(groupBy(dim_reviews_order_id),
	sk_review = first(sk_review)) ~> AggByOrderId
DimSeller select(mapColumn(
		sk_seller,
		dim_seller_id = seller_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSellerFACTColumns
JoinDimSupplier, DimSellerFACTColumns join(seller_id == dim_seller_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSeller
SelectFinalFACTColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		order_id as string,
		order_item_id as string,
		sk_order_details as integer,
		sk_customer as integer,
		sk_product as integer,
		sk_seller as integer,
		sk_supplier as integer,
		sk_review as integer,
		sk_delivery_service as integer,
		sk_date as integer,
		price as double,
		freight_value as double,
		product_quantity_on_hand as integer,
		product_discount as double,
		product_unit_price as double,
		supplied_quantity_for_month as integer,
		payment_sequential as integer,
		payment_installments as double,
		payment_value as double,
		delivery_service_duration as integer,
		shipping_limit_date as timestamp,
		order_purchase_timestamp as timestamp,
		order_approved_at as timestamp,
		order_delivered_carrier_date as timestamp,
		order_delivered_customer_date as timestamp,
		order_estimated_delivery_date as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		order_id,
		order_item_id,
		sk_order_details,
		sk_customer,
		sk_product,
		sk_seller,
		sk_supplier,
		sk_review,
		sk_delivery_service,
		price,
		freight_value,
		product_quantity_on_hand,
		product_discount,
		product_unit_price,
		supplied_quantity_for_month,
		payment_sequential,
		payment_installments,
		payment_value,
		delivery_service_duration,
		shipping_limit_date,
		order_purchase_timestamp,
		order_approved_at,
		order_delivered_carrier_date,
		order_delivered_customer_date,
		order_estimated_delivery_date
	)) ~> sinktoFACT
